title: Please buff lee sin
body:
since rito wont nerf him here are my ideas for buffs:
make q a targetted skill because having a skillshot with low cd that move faster than light with 1100 range wasn't enough;
his w should grant him again armor and magic resist and his shield should scale with his ad
this buff because when going in there was the probability of the 10% that he could die with this buff now he will never miss
his e will slow attack speed again but now he will slow attack speed for 100% and the duration is doubled this buff because wasn't fair that hypercarries could 1v1 him late game
now his r scale is doubled
i didn't want buff his ulti as hard he can still be useful anyway

replies.body: WTF are you talking about?  Lee Sin is arguably the best jungler in the game and you want a buff?  His early game is so strong and his lategame is still strong, and you want to be able to 1v1 the crarries while they suck early game?  You sound so Dirt V.
The sarcasm is beyond you friend.
oh lol I just saw the title and got mad XD
